function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation in the built environment","Impact":"Risk of increased transmission and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce close contact and improve ventilation","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV sterilization, and touchless fixtures","People":"Residents, workers, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Use of public transportation and crowded areas in cities","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure and transmission in crowded public spaces","Mitigation":"Promoting physical distancing, enhancing sanitation, and reducing occupancy levels","Technologies":"Contactless payment, occupancy monitoring, and disinfection robots","People":"Commuters, travelers, and urban residents","Owner":"City authorities, transportation companies"},{"Description":"Stereotypical representations of city sounds and environments","Impact":"Influencing public perceptions of urban spaces and behaviors","Mitigation":"Promoting diversity in soundscapes, challenging stereotypes, and creating inclusive representations","Technologies":"Advanced audio recording equipment, social media campaigns, and public engagement platforms","People":"City residents, tourists, and media consumers","Owner":"Media organizations, urban planners, and content creators"}]}
